title: Push Swap Visualizer
subtitle: Interactive visualization of the sorting algorithm

opDescriptions.sa: Swap the first 2 elements at the top of stack A
opDescriptions.sb: Swap the first 2 elements at the top of stack B
opDescriptions.ss: sa and sb at the same time
opDescriptions.pa: Take the first element at the top of B and put it at the top of A
opDescriptions.pb: Take the first element at the top of A and put it at the top of B
opDescriptions.ra: Shift up all elements of stack A by 1 (first becomes last)
opDescriptions.rb: Shift up all elements of stack B by 1 (first becomes last)
opDescriptions.rr: ra and rb at the same time
opDescriptions.rra: Shift down all elements of stack A by 1 (last becomes first)
opDescriptions.rrb: Shift down all elements of stack B by 1 (last becomes first)
opDescriptions.rrr: rra and rrb at the same time
